go_data.justification: Members of the AP2/ERF superfamily bind DNA at an AGCCGCC motif in promoter regions of target genes.
ERF family members bind DNA at an AGCCGCC motif in promoter regions of target genes.
An Arabidopsis AP2/EREBP-type transcriptional repressor is involved in drought stress responses.
An Arabidopsis AP2/EREBP-type transcriptional repressor is involved in abscisic acid and drought stress responses.
As a transcription factor, APETALA2 localizes to the nucleus to regulate gene expression.
